meanings.definition: Dorbugs: small insects that are often found in damp areas
meanings.sent1: I saw tiny dorbugs crawling on the wet leaves.
meanings.sent2: The garden was infested with dorbugs after the rain.
meanings.sent3: The dorbugs seemed to be having a party in the puddle.
meanings.sent4: The dorbugs scattered like confetti when I approached.
meanings.sent5: The dorbugs shimmered in the sunlight, looking like little jewels.

meanings.definition: Dorbugs: to annoy or bother someone
meanings.sent1: Please stop trying to dorbugs me while I'm studying.
meanings.sent2: His constant questions began to dorbugs me during the movie.
meanings.sent3: The way he kept tapping his foot started to dorbugs everyone in the room.
meanings.sent4: Her persistent nagging dorbugs him like a buzzing fly.
meanings.sent5: The repetitive sound of the dripping faucet dorbugs her to no end.

meanings.definition: Dorbugs: a feeling of annoyance or frustration
meanings.sent1: She couldn't shake off the dorbugs of waiting in line for hours.
meanings.sent2: The dorbugs of dealing with the slow internet connection were unbearable.
meanings.sent3: The dorbugs of losing her keys made her laugh at her own forgetfulness.
meanings.sent4: The dorbugs of traffic on a Friday evening felt like a never-ending nightmare.
meanings.sent5: The dorbugs of having to redo the work due to a computer crash were maddening.
